channel.title: Notes on COMP4187 – Parallel Scientific Computing II
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on COMP4187 – Parallel Scientific Computing II

item.description: The course will be taught over both Term 1 and 2, and assessed by a single piece of coursework due in Term 3. There are two sections to the course: Numerical Methods II (this runs in Term 1), taught by Anne Reinarz Parallel Computing II (this runs in Term 2), taught by Lawrence Mitchell Lecture slots are at 9am on Wednesday mornings. These will be run over Zoom Click for more options
